attributes.review: i downloaded this app thinking it was a game and my phone started glitching. The glitch made my phone racist and misogynistic and won’t let anyone use it unless their a white male. Absolutely horrible now i have to THROW MY PHONE AWAY. This app needs to be taken down already before this happens to someone else..
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: OnceI downloaded the app, my phone started glitching and it played the national Anthem, then my phone kept sayn that I was too MEXICAN to have this app, I was shocked when I tried deleting the app, when I went into my home screen my wallpaper was a picture of a big ugly orange man naked🤢🍊👨🏽I am disgusted and I will not be downloading again
attributes.title: Big fat orange 🍊 man 👨🏽

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to keep up with the pOliTiCs but when I did it told be to put the money in the bag. It literally robbed me of all my savings and took my orange juice!! It was the good orange juice too not them nasty ones. Anyways, I can’t believe such a horrible experience i had with this app. 1/5 wouldn’t recommend.
attributes.title: disappointing😔👎🏽

attributes.review: My phone keeps glitching on this app! It logged out of my information and keeps closing the app when I don’t want it to. Please fix this and I really don’t trust this app at all it’s very poorly designed. I logged in and immediately had the unexplained urge to hurl up every single morsel in my body.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I got this app to see exactly what in the bottom of the Cheeto bag was going on here. I am a women of the south and I can not believe that this man this CHEETO of a small baby hands man is running our country. To all my fellow southerners y’all need to get it together and if you can’t see that there’s a problem here, bless your heart.
attributes.title: Biggest mistake of my life

attributes.review: Too many pictures of him... talk about self centered. The app is useless but if your a white supremacist then you’d probably like it since you closers minded and ignorant. I wish the Simpsons prediction of him dying in 2020 comes true because that would  make 2020 great again.... see what I did there.😉
attributes.title: This is the worst app because

attributes.review:
First off, when I opened this app I saw a fat cheesy Cheeto getting and extra cheese layer sprayed on them AND this app made my dads moms dogs uncles grandmas great grandmas sons babysitters dogs eyeballs fall out his eyes when he found a footage of an  orange talking and giving orders it was like the orange almost had been possessed and could talk which is strange, 1 star very bad app very horrifying.
Yeah,❤️
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I am very disappointed in this app😢 Right when I opened it I saw a mutant orange human thing..... And I think its against my religion😔🍊 I am very disappointed that the app store has a app that will TRAUMATIZE someone :( I have to go to daily therapy session because of this SATANIC app I hope the Appstore takes care of this app because I do not want ANYONE to witness what I did.😢😔😕🍊
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: as soon as the app was done downloading my skin started to slowly turn an orange tint and my hair started to fall out, I had to quietly uninstall the app before my hair fell out completely!! If I could give zero stars I would! it’s going to take a couple days before my skin will turn back to its normal shade. I am disgusted..
attributes.title: unacceptable

attributes.review: this is so disgusting, i opened my phone to see this app download and when i tried deleted it , it gave me a virus and then there was a big cheeto on the screen. It then came out the screen and slapped me with its blonde wig. And this is why u should never ever download this app, save ur self the trouble and the pain of getting slapped by a blonde sassy cheeto
